wikipedia_page.main:
Luke Ferrara (born 7 June 1993) is a British ice hockey player who currently plays for UK EIHL side Coventry Blaze. A member of the British national team, Ferrara previously played with the Sheffield Steelers.
He represented Great Britain at the 2019 IIHF World Championship and 2021 IIHF World Championship.
